price: И на Аллаха се ослони, а Аллах је довољан као заштитиник!
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
